readingMnemonic: Once everything you received has <kanji>ripen</kanji>ed, you kick back near your <reading>juke</reading>box (じゅく) and eat it. The jukebox sets the mood, making the ripened treat feels twice as sweet.
meaningMnemonic: If you <radical>receive</radical> something edible, arrange it in a <radical>circle</radical> and <radical>boil</radical> it. That way, it’ll <kanji>ripen</kanji> more quickly.
